job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongAthletic Greens is a 100 remote company and always has been  For this particular opening we are looking for somebody who lives in the United StatesstrongppppbrppstrongABOUT USstrongppAt Athletic Greens our purpose is to inspire fulfilling lives starting with a focus on health Our core values arenbspempeople first life is an opportunity and no compromisesemnbspThese values guide us in every decision we make We look for them within our own team but also in anyone who works with usppbrppWeve spent 10 years researching with the help of doctors naturopaths and nutritionists to create the highest efficacy and nutritionally complete supplement on the planet We never stop learning growing and researching Its our mission to continue adding value to our products and improving the lives of our customersppbrppstrongTHE ROLEstrongppWe are looking for an experienced and talentednbspstrongData Scientiststrongnbspto join our Product team Reporting to the SVP Data amp Analytics you will work directly with key stakeholders to understand business needs identify opportunities to optimize existing processes and leverage your data and analytics skills to provide better visibility into financial data and develop insights to enable leadership to make effective datadriven decisions We are looking for a selfmotivated agile teamplayer who enjoys working in a fastpaced hypergrowth environment and is excited to take on new challengesppbrppstrongWHAT YOULL DOstrongpulliIdentify design and build solutions that enable strategic initiatives and operational improvementsliliUtilize internal amp external data sources to identify promising new trends to aid in marketing strategy and product developmentliliContextualize the research amp synthesize the raw data into actionable insight amp trend reportsliliWork cross functionally with internal and external teams to deliver actionable insights amp recommendations across business functionsliliAid in the development of algorithms and automations to be used internallyliliDesign and develop ETL workflows and datasets in SQLPythonliliWrite complex SQL queries with multiple joins to automatemanipulate extractsliliTroubleshooting complex process and functional issues and manage these through to resolutionliliDiagnose and troubleshoot data discrepancies and errorsliliUnderstand existing source system data models and offer solution for improvementliliAdhoc reporting as necessary across a wide variety of business functionsliulpbrppstrongWHAT WERE LOOKING FORstrongpulliComfortable navigating large datasets acquiring and cleansing data from multiple sourcesliliProficiency with at least one of the programming languages such as R Python or SQLliliAdvanced data visualization skills and handson experience with Tableau PowerBI or other BI toolsliliStrong digital analytics skills and advanced knowledge of Google AnalyticsliliFamiliarity with AB testing experimentation and product UXUI research methodologiesliliExperience with consumer and market research methods including survey focus groups qualitative and quantitative brand consumer satisfaction experience and other studiesliliFamiliarity with B2C acquisition and subscription marketing concepts and metrics including customer journeys conversion funnels and critical reporting CAC payback retention rate etcliulpbrppstrongWHATS IN IT FOR YOUstrongpulliA 100 remote working environment which has been implemented from day oneliliAn immensely strong company culture that is enforced through the hiring process ensures values alignment and a highly collaborative teamlili90 premium coverage for top medical dental and vision plansliliA missiondriven approach to each and everything that we do with an overall goal to significantly improve our customers health and wellnessliliPaid maternity and paternity leave to allow you to spend time with your new familyliliTop of the market salary and performance incentive structure with blue sky upside potentialliliA monthly fitness class credit to support you on your health and fitness journeyliliAnnual companywide retreats and quarterly departmentwide meetups COVID permittingliliA 401k plan with companymatching because life is an opportunity and we care about your futureliliPaid holidays and an unlimited vacation policy to ensure you have a healthy worklife balanceliliThe opportunity to work with passionate highgrowth businessminded colleagues who bring their all to the Athletic Greens mission each and every dayliliA brand new company laptop and a generous homeoffice budget so you can work your bestliulpbrppemAthletic Greens is an Equal Opportunity Employer We are committed to inspiring fulfilling lives starting with a focus on health and we believe this starts in the workplace We do this by providing employees with a safe and welcoming work environment free of discrimination and harassment We strive to create a diverse amp inclusive environment where all team members can thrive feel a sense of belonging and make a difference in the world together We do not discriminate based on age race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin pregnancy veteran status disability or any other status protected by law We are an equal opportunity employeremppp
